channel.title: admin on Erik R. Vickstrom, PhD
channel.description: Recent content in admin on Erik R. Vickstrom, PhD

item.description: Erik Vickstrom is a proven analytic and survey-research professional with more than ten yearsâ€™ experience in research and programming in population issues, education, environmental management, and food security. A sociologist by training, Dr. Vickstrom has designed and led large-scale behavioral research activities in Africa, Europe, and the US. Areas of research expertise include international migration and development, immigrant integration and educational aspirations, inequality, and diversity and social cohesion. Additional specializations include research methods (quantitative, qualitative, and demographic) and teaching.
